document.webtitle: When it comes to take-out , what is best choice if someone is on a diet? are noodles like better than pizza..? - Yahoo! Answers
document.description: Cars & Transportation; Computers & Internet ... I wouldn't pick noodle because they are starch ... is even better. Get a salad at your fast food restaurant.

What are you looking for? Advanced Search Home > All Categories > Health > Diet&Fitness > Resolved Question Jonathan S Member since: August 30, 2008 Total points: 311 (Level 2) Add Contact Block
Resolved Question Show me another » When it comes to take-out , what is best choice if someone is on a diet? are noodles like better than pizza..? hamburger etc? 4 years ago Report Abuse by Addicted to Diet Coke Member since: June 15, 2006 Total points: 10,302 (Level 6) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Voters rice or vegetable dishes are good. 4 years ago Report Abuse 100% 1 Vote Action Bar: 0 stars - mark this as Interesting! Email Comment ( 0 ) Save Add to My Yahoo! Add to Del.icio.us RSS
There are currently no comments for this question.
* You must be logged into Answers to add comments. Sign in or Register .
Other Answers (5) Show: All Answers Oldest to Newest Newest to Oldest Rated Highest to Lowest by complica... Member since: May 02, 2008 Total points: 6,988 (Level 5) Add Contact Block The best choice is to get a thin and crispy crust, with your choice of meat and tons of veggies.
For example"Can I have a medium thin crust, ham and veggie lover pizza"
that is great because there isn't ton's of fats (meats) but still protein, not tons of breads but some, and then lots of veggies. 4 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by jewelz14... Member since: July 10, 2008 Total points: 2,117 (Level 3) Add Contact Block take out noodles are a no no because they are made with lots of oil, and takeout pizza has a very thick crust, and lots of grease, the burger without the bun would be healthy, and make sure to skip fatty condiments like mayo and use mustard, also salads with grilled chicken are healthy, hope that helps 4 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by ♥Casey♥ Member since: August 05, 2007 Total points: 2,247 (Level 3) Add Contact Block I wouldn't pick noodle because they are starch and oily. Pizza is okay, but it has lots of grease, if you pick pizza, eat only 1 or 2 slices and save the rest for later. The hamburger is healthy because it is made with beef and beef is good source of protein. I'd pick the burger. :) 4 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by Jenny Member since: August 31, 2008 Total points: 394 (Level 2) Add Contact Block Take out food is notoriously high in bad saturated fat and sugar - both of which will mess up a diet.
My advice: avoid take out food. It's all refined processed junk anyway, unbelievably unhealthy.
http://www.scrumptiouslyrealnutrition.co… 4 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by recycle b Member since: August 10, 2008 Total points: 23,404 (Level 6) Add Contact Block Noodles are high in Carbs- a little portion of protein such as hamburger is even better. Get a salad at your fast food restaurant. 4 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes
